com.ashwin.fri.neural

Class PacManDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.genetic.GeneticDecoder
      • com.ashwin.fri.neural.PacManDecoder

  • public class PacManDecoder
extends GeneticDecoder
    The PacManDecoder is responsible for training the neural net's weights. Fitness is calculated as 1 / score, because the genetic algorithm MINIMIZES the fitness of the population.
    Author:
    ashwin
